attributes.action: take all possible steps to improve the standard of written English
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
One merely has to look through many of the petitions on this very website to realise the alarming depths to which the standard of spelling has slumped.

One petitioner has even managed to spell "petition" incorrectly!

It is clearly necessary immediately to improve this, refuse to accept "text-speak" in examinations or any other formal communications etc
